org.kiji.rest.representations
Class GenericResourceRepresentation

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.rest.representations.GenericResourceRepresentation

public class GenericResourceRepresentation
extends Object

Class used to represent a generic resource that has a name and a corresponding URI used to access this resource.

Constructor Summary
GenericResourceRepresentation()
          Default constructor to satisfy Jackson.
GenericResourceRepresentation(String resourceName, String resourceURI)
          Constructs a GenericResourceRepresentation given a name and a URI.
 
Method Summary
 String getName()
          Returns the name of the resource.
 String getURI()
          Returns the URI of the resource.

Constructor Detail

GenericResourceRepresentation

public GenericResourceRepresentation(String resourceName,
                                     String resourceURI)
Constructs a GenericResourceRepresentation given a name and a URI.

Parameters:
resourceName - is the name of the resource.
resourceURI - is the URI to access this resource. This may or may not include the resourceName but generally does.
